Title: Expert Consultant
Description:
You alone are no longer sufficient. We require additional assistance, and the jawcrawlers and threadlings also need oversight.

The niffen settlement, Mmarl, is not far. However, past forced conscription attempts have failed. Nerubians are now forbidden within the settlement. We need someone to communicate in our stead.

Go and barter with the rats. Come back with able bodies.
ObjectivesText: Speak with Mmarl's leader about recruiting swarmhands.
RewardText: The nerubians want our help again? I'd like to hear this...
